roleset.name: ot make flat or flatter

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: mild flattening of the left ventral aspect of the pons
example.arg: of the left ventral aspect of the pons

roleset.note: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to flatten.01-v. Flatten.01 is a member of VN classes carve-21.2-1 and other_cos-45.4. No FN class. Framed by Katie.
